sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SICILIAN, in music, denotes a kind of gay sprightly air, or dance, probably invented in Sicily, ſomewhat of the nature of an Engliſh jig ; uſually marked with the characters 6 / 8 or 12 / 8, or . It conſiſts of two ſtrains ; the firſt
of four, and the second of eight, bars or meafures.
